marketing.aiTradingAssistantDesc: Intelligent market analysis, personalized trading advice, and instant answers to your trading questions 24/7 ‚Äî powered by PelicanAI. Get market context, personalized coaching, and strategic insights whenever you need them.
marketing.personalizedCoachingDesc: Tailored advice for your trading style
marketing.availability24Desc: Always available when markets are moving
marketing.customStrategiesDesc: Develop and test personalized trading strategies using historical market data and backtesting tools.
marketing.statisticalEdgeDesc: Analyze historical data to find trading opportunities and develop data-driven trading approaches.
marketing.aiTradingAssistantCardDesc: Your intelligent trading companion for market analysis, strategy development, and real-time insights.
marketing.oneOnOneCoachingDesc: Personalized trading mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals.
marketing.tradingCommunityDesc: Join our exclusive trading community powered by TradingAnalytix partnership.
marketing.aboutStory1: Pelican Trading wasn't built in a lab or spun up by a venture fund. It was built by traders ‚Äî people who live this game every day, who know the grind of wins, losses, and the constant battle with psychology.
marketing.aboutStory2: Eight years ago, the founder of Pelican, Nick Groves, walked away from the traditional path to go all-in on the markets. No degree, no safety net, no inside edge ‚Äî just curiosity, obsession, and a Wi-Fi connection. What began as reverse-engineering strategies and journaling every mistake has now evolved into an AI platform unlike anything else in the market.
marketing.builtBrickByBrickDesc1: Pelican didn't come from a corporate playbook. It was coded, broken, and rebuilt from scratch by traders turned devs who knew exactly what was missing.
marketing.builtBrickByBrickDesc2: Every feature ‚Äî from the AI brain to live market modules, from journaling to psychology triggers ‚Äî was handcrafted with one purpose: to make traders sharper in real time.
marketing.forgedByArchitect: Forged by the Architect of Modern Markets
marketing.forgedByArchitectDesc1: Pelican isn't just trader-made anymore. Today, the team includes Ray Campbell ‚Äî one of the original architects behind the New York Stock Exchange's electronic platform.
marketing.forgedByArchitectDesc2: Ray helped build the ultra-low latency, high-throughput systems that power billions of dollars in trades daily ‚Äî the very backbone of modern markets. Now, he's bringing that same institutional-grade engineering to Pelican.
marketing.rayCampbellQuote: For years, I built tools that gave an edge to Wall Street. Pelican is about giving that power back to the people ‚Äî tools with the same precision, speed, and reliability, but accessible to every trader.
marketing.ourMissionDesc1: Most trading services drown you in noise and false realities. Pelican's mission is to cut through it. We're building the first AI assistant that trades the way traders actually trade ‚Äî combining data, discipline, and psychology in one place, while adapting to each trader's journey.
marketing.ourMissionDesc2: By fusing Wall Street-grade engineering with real trading experience, Pelican bridges the gap between retail and institutional markets once and for all. Every trader deserves access to the same intelligence, speed, and resilience that power the world's largest exchanges.
marketing.ourMissionTagline: Pelican isn't just another tool ‚Äî it's the future of how humans and AI trade together.
marketing.unlockAdvanced: Unlock advanced AI-powered trading insights and join thousands of successful traders using PelicanAI
marketing.freePlanDesc: Get started with basic PelicanAI features
marketing.pelicanAIProDesc: Unlock the full power of PelicanAI

marketing.faqSubtitle: Get answers to common questions about PelicanAI and our trading platform.
marketing.faqA1: PelicanAI is an AI-powered trading assistant that provides real-time market analysis, trading strategies, and personalized coaching. Built by professional traders for traders of all levels.
marketing.faqA2: We offer a free plan with up to 10 messages per day, and PelicanAI Pro at $49.99/month for unlimited access, premium features, and priority support.
marketing.faqA3: PelicanAI provides analysis for stocks, ETFs, futures, forex, and cryptocurrencies.
marketing.faqA4: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security with encrypted data transmission and storage. We never store your trading account credentials or execute trades without your permission.
marketing.faqA5: Yes! We offer 1-on-1 coaching sessions with Nick Groves and access to the TradingAnalytix community for personalized guidance and strategy development.
marketing.faqA6: Simply click "Chat with PelicanAI" to start using our AI assistant for free. You can upgrade to Pro anytime for full access to all features and tools.
